node.title: Van with an 'angel onboard': Motorbike rider praises tourists for helping save his mate's life
node.alt: A man wrapped in a space blanket next to a van with people helping him
node.description: The Zavros family weren't the only travellers to be rescued from the remote SA outback this week. Bill Kidd says a van "with an angel onboard" helped save his mate's life.Â
node.content:
["A motorcyclist has praised a van \"with an angel onboard\" and the Royal Flying Doctor Service for saving his mate's life when an outback ride went horribly wrong.", "Bill Kidd and his 69-year-old friend were in a trio of riders returning from Birdsville on a trip to celebrate Mr Kidd's 70th birthday when his companion crashed his bike, halfway between Mungerannie in SA's Far North and the Queensland border.", "\"We don't know exactly what went wrong \u2014\u00a0perhaps a tyre blowout \u2014\u00a0but he was very badly injured,\" Mr Kidd said.", "\"The bike was also very badly injured,\" he joked.", "They were 150 kilometres from the nearest town or phone coverage, and the temperature was nudging 40 degrees Celsius\u00a0in the shade.", "\"We were incredibly fortunate that even though we'd seen no more than two or three cars on the track for two or three days, there was a van with a couple of young tourists travelling 10 minutes behind us.\"", "", "
The Royal Flying Doctor\u00a0Service was able to collect them from an airstrip at\u00a0Clifton Hills cattle station.(Supplied: Stan Dandyliver)
", "Mr Kidd said one of the tourists had a medical background, and was able to help provide first aid to the injured rider, while they rested in the shade of the vehicle's awning.", "He triggered his emergency beacon, alerting Californian authorities, who contacted teams in Coober Pedy and Birdsville.", "The RFDS met them on the airstrip at the nearby Clifton Hills cattle station \u2014\u00a0\u00a0about four hours after the accident.", "The injured man was flown to the Royal Adelaide Hospital where he has undergone surgery.", "\"As good an ending as you can expect under those circumstances.\"", "
Mishap in 'beautiful but dangerous outback'
", "Mr Kidd said he was initially \"very scared and concerned\" for his mate, especially in the heat, but was glad they had come prepared.", "It follows the rescue of Perth's Zavros family, who got bogged in the SA outback after a freak rain event, and were rescued ahead of the hot weather.", "\"One doesn't undertake these trips lightly\u00a0\u2014\u00a0that's why I carry my EPIRB, that's why we carry the strong drugs, that's why we carry the camping gear, and food, and water,\" Mr Kidd said.", "", "
The motorbike rider remains in the Royal Adelaide Hospital.\u00a0(Supplied: Stan Dandyliver)
", "Despite the isolation of the Australian outback, Mr Kidd was gobsmacked by the number of people who came to their aid.", "\"An incredible thank you to everyone involved in the search and recovery \u2014\u00a0the Royal Flying Doctor Service, the people from Clifton Hills station, the workers who came and helped us transport [the rider], the young couple that basically managed the crisis.\"", "Mr Kidd said another trip to Australia's red centre could be on the cards.", "\"Well, I won't be going tomorrow, but I'm 70 years of age \u2014 I've got more trips in me,\" he said."]
